1565908709_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5.body:
> [unadu](#comment_21_16tiWQCvXDH6r8GWNGUzvvnAHqN89eX72W): Freenet is for niggers, just like anonet.Go I2P or go home.

Freenet is dead-end in its current form. No way to scale, too large load on hardware. It's a good toy to play around a bit. But just that. It needs a complete rewrite from scratch with new technologies and solutions to help scale up.

1565995598_1JyZMdd3V3by1dd9xwU1jyUsHgbPK.body: He wouldn't get shot if he didn't steal. It doesn't mean nothing if it is a 2 dollar beer or 50k dollars car. If it isn't yours, don't touch it.

1569594101_14A3LXiT8D3gtRGJSMG3eMbKDtRPd.body:
They're is nothing that attracts average Joe to use zeronet. You need YouTube, Google, Facebook etc f to make it popular. But zeronet is not ready for such services, it won't handle page with millions of videos. Can you imagine downloading few terabytes of data to get all the way from first revision to current up to date revision of "YouTube"? That's how current zeronet works. If it's good for some geeks, not for everyday use as replacement for centralized net.

I think it will never be, if you want security you won't be able to have such great experience as in centralized network. I believe I is impossible to marry this two things.

I see one more disadvantage of 0net. Being afraid of passing/storing illegal content like CP. Lets say you visited some imageboard and it was okay but after some time other users posted CP. You wanted to help zeronet and host page with bigfiles and boom - you don't know that but you own and distribute CP. 

Legislation and courts/judges are lacking behind technology and would not understand explanation "there is decentralized network where everyone is hosting distributed pages and this CP appeared on my PC from 'nowhere' and I did distribute it because the principle of operation of 0net".
